Class ViewFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.ViewFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, IEventPerformer, IView

    public class ViewFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements IView, java.lang.Runnable, IEventPerformer

    The Class ViewFacade provides a facade of the View component.
